All Classes

Class Description
AcademicGrade  
Account
is the stencil for the subclasses Professor and Student contains basic attributes of and account, who get more specific in the subclasses Provides the user with the functionalities to personalize their account
AccountTest
Test class for the functions of Account
AudioFile
Provides an AudioFile for side of a card that can be played and paused Currently using placeholder Strings Will be real Audio in Java 2
Card
Provides a 2 sided Card(front and back) for CardList and CardStatus connects trough CardContent (Interface) to the different filetypes
CardContent
CardContent is the connection interface between Card and *File Classes
CardContentTest
Class to test the functionalities of the CardContent-Child-Classes Only those funtionalities are tested here, that are not already tested in the class CardTest
CardKnowledgeLevel  
CardList
Provides CardList with Cards and a Pointer to the current ListIndex
CardListTest
Test class for all the functions of CardList
CardStatus
Provides current CardStatus of a Card Shows and edits CardKnowledgeLevel of any Account who has the Card in a LearnSetAbo
CardStatusTest
Provides test of functionalities of the CardStatus class
CardTest
Class for testing all functionality of the CardClass
Chat
Class Chat has 2 Attributes chatHistory where the messages from all participants are stored and participants where the participants are stored Participants can be added to the Chat but only after adding the creator
ChatTest
Test class for the functions of Chat
Faculty  
LearningSession
Provides a ArrayList of CardStatus, so that the Account can Learn the Cards.
LearningSessionTest
This class tests the functions of the class LearningSessionTests
LearnSet
Provides CardList with additional information: Title, Description, Faculty(to which Accounts from which Faculties it will be shown) CommentList, Evaluations(only 1 per Account->LearnSetAbo is possible) Owner(Account who created the LearnSet), Admins(Accounts who can edit the LearnSet) Visibility(to show the LearnSet to all Account, to Faculty and Friends or only to Owner)
LearnSetAbo
Provides a LearnSet with further, account-specific information and is thus always embedded into an account.
LearnSetAboTest
Tests the functions of the Class LearnSetAbo
LearnSetTest
Test class for all the functions of LearnSet
Message
The class message is used to store informations about a message which are : the message its self - the sender - the time it was sent - the number of likes and the people who liked this message as a list
MessageTest
Test class for the functions of Message
PictureFile
Provides an PictureFile for side of a card Currently using placeholder Strings Will be real Picture in Java 2
Professor
extends the account class additional variable academicGrade
State  
Student
extends the account class additional variables semester and faculty
TextFile
Provides an TextFile as String for side of a card
VideoFile
Provides an VideoFile for side of a card that can be played and paused Currently using placeholder Strings Will be real Video in Java 2
Visibility
